basic.description: Effective project management is both a skill set and a leadership function that requires discipline in planning, organizing, and managing resources to execute projects to meet the strategic project goals and objectives; as such, this course will cover indepth project management and leadership concepts in the four basic functions of management (planning, organizating, directing, and controlling) to a project context.Successful completion of this course will provide students with the eligibility to earn a Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) designation through the Project Management Institute (PMI).
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Project Management
